desc: Firepit outfitters helps create memories in your back yard with quality firepits, firetables and firebowls. We are a Canadian company and pass on the savings by not having a store front. We sell our own brand as well as Elementi & Modena Lines and have three showrooms in BC.

layout.text: Our range of Fire Tables combine Beauty & Function
Bring some new Life to your Patio or Outdoor Living Area with our amazing collection
